sentences.en: Adopt prefab, installation convenient 、 Performance dependable 、 protect dampness good 、 Longevity long feature.
sentences.cn: 采用组合式, 便于安装、性能可靠、防潮性好、寿命长等特点.

sentences.en: And longevity claims as credible as the birth records they're based on.
sentences.cn: 另外,长寿说法的可靠性还有赖于出生记录的可靠性.
人类的长寿具有家族遗传性。

sentences.en: Increased human longevity is otherwise hardly a bad thing.
sentences.cn: 从其他方面看,人类寿命延长很难说是坏事.

sentences.en: Industry accord may help make this longevity a reality.
sentences.cn: 工业界的调和将有助于使这种长寿命成为现实.

sentences.en: It was polygyny that accounts for human females'general longevity over males.
sentences.cn: 正是一夫多妻制使得女性比男性更加长寿.

sentences.en: Longevity Hill is the focal point of the Summer Palace.
sentences.cn: 万寿山石颐和园的中心,从山顶可以俯瞰全景.

sentences.en: One day a neighbor asked him, " To what do you attribute your good health and longevity. "
sentences.cn: 一天,一位邻居问他, “ 你认为健康长寿的原因何在? ”

sentences.en: Recent studies make a direct connection between longevity and teeth flossing.
sentences.cn: 最近的研究表明:长寿跟用牙线洁齿直接相关.

sentences.en: The ancient Chinese claimed that garlic promoted longevity.
The Summer Palace is mainly composed of Longevity Hill and Kunming Lake.
sentences.cn: 颐和园主要是由万寿山和昆明湖组成的.

sentences.en: The team depended on the veteran's longevity for their success.
sentences.cn: 该小组依靠老将的称职为他们取得了成功.

sentences.en: They help eradicate disease, expand food production and increase longevity.
sentences.cn: 它们帮助消除疾病, 扩大粮食生产,延长人寿命.

sentences.en: This is dark cloud outside the silver lining of increasing longevity.
sentences.cn: 这是笼罩在长寿之光外的乌云.

sentences.en: We wish you both health and longevity.
sentences.cn: 我们祝愿您二位健康长寿。

trans.tran_en: the amount of time that someone or something lives
